channel.title: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?"

item.title: Re: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
item.content:encoded:
for the record (since you surely have your butterfly already):

if you are white-eye-nin and can afford to use epic dog urination technique, than use that instead of white eye, since epic EDUT increases the chances ten times and WhiteEye only doubles them. Both are jutsus, so you can only use one of them.

item.title: Re: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
item.content:encoded:
thx for all the tips with them i finally got it yesterday!!!

thx a lot :)

item.title: Re: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
item.content:encoded: Also, you could ask in the village if anyone else has/can get an extra one. That's what a few in one of my villages did and he had both butterflies the next day.

item.title: Re: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
item.content:encoded: The last post is very good advice, and I recommend following it. The only thing of note is that ramen can only be purchased when you have a Ninja Cooking School. The Ramen shop alone doesn't sell ramen.

item.title: Re: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
item.content:encoded:
Also try using Ichi Special Ramen (if your village has a Tasty Ramen Shop), WhiteEye, Spot/Spot Lvl. 2, the Let the Dog Out Bonus team, or the Stand By Your Ninja theme (if you're in Season 2+).

It's a lot easier in later seasons and in bigger villages.

item.title: Re: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
item.content:encoded:
Hikari Village

and no i do have enough lvls and stuff… ok so today imma try to do general missions :) thx .. hopefullt i'll get it this week ^^

item.title: Re: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
item.content:encoded:
you have to do general mission and use epic dog urination jutsu.

I have all 4 that does not matter. Don't do a single mission, it must be general. Hardest part is getting the mission, after that use epic and u should get it, unless you have low levels or strength.

What village are you in?

item.title: Obtaining Heckbutterfly? as fourth item?
item.content:encoded:
hi,

i have the other 3 reaper items and i have been looking for the heckbutterfly for 2 weeks now… really i have spend 14 days of stam all on D ranked mission!! for the most part in taijutsu related missions but i haven't gotten the mission even once!!!! well actually i remember i had it once but the heckbutterfly didn't drop but i think that was back when i had 1 reaper item … so here's my actuall question: do i have to sell let's say the blue hairpin thing so that i only have 2 reaper items in order for the heckbutterfly to drop? or to get the mission?

i mean i have literaly spend 4000 stam just on finding that stupid thing! (includes bonuses and stuff).

or does it only drop doing general mission? i doubt that though the only thing i can think of is that i can only have 3 of those items total?
